text: dev ko teen din baad phir dard hua
saaree raat veena usakee maalish karatee rahee
ekek karake dev ne dard kee chaar goliyaan kha leen
tab kaheen vah so paaya
subahasavere veena ne amit se dev kee dasha ke vishay mein baat kee
vah bhee chintit ho utha
dev us samay baatharoom mein tha
veena ke paas samay tha amit se baat karane ka bolee vah  amit us din doktar gupta kee baat sunakar mujhe dar lag gaya
ekaek aisa laga ki jaise vah kahana chaah rahe hon ki aage yadi dard ho to ve doosare kisee aspataal mein jaen
vahaan ke speshalist ko dikhaen aur rediyotharaipee karava len
amit yah sunakar bola  rediyotharaipee aapane us din to mujhe bataaya nahin
use tanik aashchary hua  usakee kya jaroorat hai
vah to bola ki mainne opareshan ke baad hee kaha tha
veena ne sanyat svar mein kaha  ab bhee der nahin huee
dev ko dard baarabaar uth raha hai
aisa kyon kaha usane  apane man ke bhay ko kuchh ujaagar kiya usane
main kya jaanoon bhaabhee usane aisa kyon kaha haan opareshan ke baad usane aisa kuchh nahin kaha tha isaka mujhe poora pata hai
tab vah baat ramesh bhaee ya mohan bhaee se hee karata tha
ve saaree baaten mujhe bata dete the
amit kee baat mein sachchaee thee veena ko laga
veena kee aankhon se aansoo tapak pade
amit bhee bhaavuk ho gaya
bola  bhaabhee duhkhee mat hoeee
main to har kisee se aapakee misaal deta hoon
aapane kitanee himmat kee dev se shaadee kee haan karake
veena ne aansoo ponchhate hue dekha amit kee or
ghar mein sabase chhota
shabdon mein kaheen use chaturaee na dikhee
ekaek kah uthee tum bhee aisa hee samajhate ho ki mujhe pata tha
haan vigyaapan to jo banaaya tha vah dev ne hee likh kar diya tha
shesh main itanee baat jaanata hoon ki dev ne aapase jaroor baat kee hogee ya phir ramesh bhaee ne aapake daidee se
amit ko aashchary ho raha tha
veena ke mukh se aisa sunakar
veena tab bolee  tumhen premasa darja diya hai
apana chhota bhaee maanane lagee hoon
tumase hee kahakar man halka kar rahee hoon ki mujhe is baat ka kuchh pata nahin chala
vigyaapan mein jo likha tha vah to medikal tarm mere kya kisee bhee padhelikhe ko samajh nahin aa sakatee
lekin usake baad kisee ne bhee is baat ka jikr nahin kiya
mere ghar vaale to abhee bhee nahin jaanate ki dev mein koee kamee hai bhee
sab meree aur dev kee jodee ko dekhadekh kar hee khushee se bhare hain
veena kee baat sunakar sann rah gaya amit
bola  ye kaise ho sakata hai bhaabhee main jo ghar bhar kee jimmevaaree nibhaata hoon main bhee is dhokhe mein raha
thoda aavesh mein aa gaya vah  main aaj hee ramesh bhaee ko patr likhakar poochhoonga
unhonne yah baat kyon nahin kholee
nahin tum aisa kuchh nahin karoge
kisee se bhee nahin bologe
aur na hee dev se bhee kuchh poochhoge
tumhen meree kasam is baat ko tumase kah diya yahee kaaphee hai
na jaane kaise main himmat kar baithee
aaj mere dil ka bojh halka ho gaya hai
lekin jo kuchh kaha hai bhaee maanakar
isase aage tum chup rahoge
vah bolatee ja rahee thee
mammeedaidee aa rahe hain
dhyaan rahe unhen kuchh na pata lage
mere daidee vaise to bahut shaant prakrti ke hain
par jab unhen gussa aa jae to kuchh ka kuchh kar dete hain
na jaane kya nirnay le baithen
mainne sab apane bhaagy par chhod diya hai
dev ka mere jeevan mein aana likha tha vah ho gaya
ab jo hoga achchha hee hoga
mujhe to lagata bhee nahin ki main kabhee dev ko nahin jaanatee thee
main man se dev ko chaahane lagee hoon
aise mein tum meree itanee hee madad kar do ki mere maataapita jaise hansate hue khushee se aaen vaise hee vah lauten
shesh jo hoga jaisa hoga achchha hee hoga aisa mera vishvaas hai
amit ko lagee veena deveeroop ek shakti is tej raphtaar se chalatee jindagee mein anoothee aurat
jise shaadee ke baad pata laga ki usake saath dhokha hua hai lekin khush hai
apanee khaatir hee nahin apane parivaar kee bhee khaatir
jisane kitanee khushee se sab apana liya hai
abhee das minat pahale tak use jo lag raha tha vah to bilkul asaty tha
usake man mein jo bhaav the vah aur oopar utha gae veena ke svaroop ko
barabas usakee aankhon se aansoo bah nikale
bola vah  main bhee aapaka gunaahagaar hoon
mujhe jo chaahe saja de do
kaisee baat karate ho amit bhaee samajha tabhee man kee baat kah rahee hoon
aisa kuchh bhee mat socho
mujhe tumase kya kisee se gila nahin hai
veena kee baat sunakar amit natamastak ho gaya
baatharoom se paanee chalane kee aavaaz band ho gaee thee
dev ke nikal aane mein chand hee minat the tab veena ne baat samaapt karate hue kaha  dhyaan rakhana jo tumhen kaha hai
aur yah kahakar vah rasoeeghar kee or badh gaee
aur amit apane kamare mein chala gaya
dev ko devarabhaabhee ke beech hue vaartaalaap ka kuchh pata na chala
apane maataapita se milakar veena ka man prasann ho utha
pyaar se maan kee godee mein sir rakh kar aankhen band kar leen usane
maan ka sahaara
maan jise vah apane dil ka sab haal bata sakatee thee
maan jo usake man kee bhaasha ko badee saralata se padh sakatee thee
maan nirmala ko lag raha tha jaise veena bahut dinon baad shaanti pa rahee hai usase milane ke baad
jaise man mein usake dherasee baaten hain jo vah usase kahana chaahatee hai
aise mein hee jab ve donon kamare mein akele rah gae tab poochha nirmala ne  veena too khush hai na
haan maan bahut khush hoon
veena ne aankhen band kie hue kaha
bahut khush hoon
aur usake shaant chehare par band aankhon se aansoo bahane lage
yah aansoo khushee ke the ya ki kisee gam kee pahachaan karava rahe the ekaek nirmala na samajh paee bolee  are aansoo kyon bahaatee ho
mujhase milane kee itanee chaah thee to chalee aatee deharaadoon main door to nahin itanee
usakee aankhen ponchhate hue bolee  shaadee ke baad rahee bhee kitana hai too mere paas do hee din ab naagapur se aaoongee to saath chalana mere
dasapandrah din mere paas rahana
dev aakar tujhe le jaenge
aankhen band kie veena ne tab kaha  tum laut aao maan naagapur se
mere paas rahana kuchh din
mere lie to dev ko chhodakar jaana mushkil hai
are kyon mushkil hai  maan ko veena ka yoon kahana achchha bhee laga
man mein socha kitanee achchhee baat hai
patipatnee mein itana pyaar ho gaya hai ki ab ekadoosare ke bina kaheen rahana nahin chaahate
vaise hee bhaav lie bolee  achchha laga sunakar
par betee maan ko bhee to teree yaad aatee hai
dev jee se main kahoongee
kuchh din jaroor rahane ko chalana mere saath
veena ko laga vah bhaavuk ho uthegee
man kee baat kaheen shabd banakar mukh se nikal na jaen
ekaek uthakar baith gaee
aankhen saaph karate hue bolee  chalo na maan aap naagapur se pahale achchhee khabar le aao
mera kya hai jab man aaega main aa jaoongee
aur rajanee kee shaadee kee taareekh pakkee ho jaegee
tab to main shaadee se pahale aakar saath hee to rahoongee aapake
baat vaheen ruk gaee
dev kolej se laut aaya tha
maan nirmala va pita pannaalaal ko usane charan sparsh kiya aur unaka haalachaal poochhane laga
baaton hee baaton mein nirmala ko laga ki dev jaise bechain hai
poochh uthee vah  tabiyat theek hai na dev jee kuchh bechain lag rahe hain
dev tab halkaasa dard mahasoos kar raha tha use dabaate hue bola  nahin bas thak gaya hoon
iseelie thoda sir mein dard mahasoos ho raha hai
maan ko sach lagee usakee baat
bolee  chalo beta aap aaraam kar lo
main thodee der bahanajee ke paas baithatee hoon
vaise bhee shaam kee to hamaaree gaadee hai
maan ne patipatnee ko akela chhod diya
veena tab bolee  dard ho raha hai kya
haan halkaasa kolej mein hee golee kha lee thee
dev ne tab kaha
aankhen bojhil ho rahee theen usakee
aap aaraam kar leejie
main khaana taiyaar karatee hoon
shaam tak aaraam aa jaega
theek rahenge to mammeedaidee ko steshan chhodane chalenge
veena tab kamare se baahar jaane ko huee
dev ne tab poochha  kuchh baat to nahin huee mammeedaidee se   man ka chor ujaagar kiya usane
jaise isee baat kee pareshaanee thee
iseelie hee bechain tha vah
kaisee baat karate hain aap chalie aaraam keejie   aur veena baahar nikal gaee
dev ka aadha dard to use theek hota mahasoos hua
naagapur se laut kar maan nirmala ne achchhee khabar dee
rajanee kee shaadee vah pakkee kar aae the
do maheene baad ka mahoort nikala tha
ladake vaale deharaadoon aane ko maan gae the
ladake vaalon mein hai hee kaun ladaka hee apane ghar ka kartaadharta hai
bade bhaiya to usake relave mein cheephinjeeniyar hain
apanee naukaree mein mast rahate hain
chhote do bhaee aur hain ve bhee apaneapane kaam mein lage rahate hain
maan vidhava hai
vah bechaaree to yahee kahatee rahee ki patron ka javaab dene ke lie vah apane bade bete ko likhatee thee lekin use unakee chinta nahin
tab himmat karake ladake ne svayan likha
baat kuchh bhee nahin thee
ve yoon hee chup baithe the
maan ne veena ko vistaar se sab baat bataate hue kaha
ladake ke baare mein sab dekh liya na maan  veena ne tab poochha
bhale log hain
isase adhik aur kya dekhasamajh sakate hain ham
vishvaas to karana hee padata hai
ladakee kee shaadee to jua hai betee grhasthee theek chalatee rahe yahee kaamana kar sakate hain ladakee vaale aur jo shaadee ke baad hota hai vah sab ladakee ka apana bhaagy hee hota hai
maan nirmala ne sahaj bhaav se kaha veena se
ve kya jaane veena kee baat mein chhipe marm ko
haan maan tum theek kahatee ho
shaadee ke baad jo kuchh bhee hota hai vah ladakee ke bhaagy mein likha hota hai
shaadee ek aisa bandhan hai hamaare samaaj ka jise jitana nibhaana chaaho jaise nibhaana chaaho vaise hee nibh jaata hai
kuchh baaten to jaanakar bhee nahin dekh paate ham
kuchh baaten samajhakar bhee samajh nahin paate ham
baatabaat par shak to nahin kiya ja sakata
phir bhee rajanee ka bhaagy balavaan hoga yahee kaamana hai meree
haan betee rajanee ka bhaagy apanee donon badee bahanon jaisa hee hoga
suneeta khush hai apane pati ke saath
tum khush ho apane pati ke saath
hamaara jeevan to saphal ho gaya
rajanee ke baad bas priya aur geeta ke haath peele ho jaen jaldee se to mera jeevan bhee saphal ho jaega
maan kee aankhon mein chhipee khushee ko veena ne sahaara diya
vah usakee aankhon kee chamak ko kam nahin aur adhik badhate hue dekhana chaah rahee thee
bolee  priya ke lie maan mujhe amit bahut achchha lagata hai
bahut achchha ladaka hai
apane parivaar mein sabase alag
sab kee bhaavanaon kee chaah rahatee hai use
mera to bahut dhyaan rakhata hai
amit ke prati apanee bhaavanaon ko vah maan ke sammukh vyakt kar rahee thee aur kah baithee  main bhee yahaan khush hoon
aur amit to apanee patnee ko palakon par bitha kar rakhega
maan ko jaise veena kee baat bahut achchhee lagee
bolee  main priya se poochhoongee
daidee se bhee baat karoongee tumhaare
jaise kuchh yaad aaya unhen bolee  priya ke janmadin par amit ka kaard bhee aaya tha
vah bhee use paakar khush huee thee
veena ko yah khabar sunakar aashchary hua
amit ne apane man kee baat usase chhipa kar rakhee thee
use amit par aur adhik sneh umad aaya
priya ke lie use amit mein koee kamee jo nahin lag rahee thee
unakee baat vaheen ruk gaee
shaam amit apane kaam se laut kar jab aaya to veena ne use chheda  amit priya ne tumhaaree shikaayat kee hai
ekaek priya ka naam sunakar vah hadabada gaya bola  meree shikaayat mainne kya kiya hai   yah to tum hee jaano
mujhase to baaton hee baaton mein poochha tha usaka janmadin aur phir tumane kya kiya main kya jaanoon  muskura rahee thee veena
mainne kya kiya  sochane ka naatak kiya amit ne  mainne kuchh nahin kiya bas aapake greeting kaard ke saath apana bhee ek kaard bhej diya
muskuraane laga vah yah kahakar
bas yahee shikaayat ki usake baad amit ne usakee koee khabar nahin lee  veena kee baat sunakar amit khush ho gaya
aisee baat hai bhaabhee jaanatee ho main usake naam roz kuchh na kuchh likhata hoon apanee daayaree mein
amit jo kitane dinon se himmat kar raha tha apane man kee baat kahane kee vah itanee saralata se bata paayega veena ko isaka to use andesha bhee na tha
vah kah raha tha  ab mujhe lagata hai use patr likhana chaahie
aisa mujhase kyon poochh rahe ho khud se nirnay lo
veena ke chehare par sneh bhare bhaav the
amit ko apanee munh maangee muraad pooree hotee dikh rahee thee
